'''Favonian Devotion''' is [[Jean]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Jean's hair is tied back into a high ponytail with a black bow. On her ears, she wears a pair of gold cross earrings.

She wears a strapless shirt with a long blue tailcoat attached to it, a pair of separate white sleeves, a short blue and gold cloak attached to a white collar, white tights embroidered with a gold diamond-dot pattern, a pair of white high-heeled knee-high boots, and a pair of blue gauntlets. Her shirt is white with red sections and black and gold trim, and there is a golden [[Knights of Favonius]] crest on the front. Her {{Anemo}} [[Vision]] hangs off her belt at her back on her left.
